meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>hit</kanji> you get in <kanji>baseball</kanji> that takes you to the <kanji>origin</kanji> plate is a <vocabulary>home run</vocabulary>. HOOOMMEERUNNNN!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
